text: Philippe Plisson (born 12 January 1951 in Saint-Caprais-de-Blaye, Gironde) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the 11th constituency of the Gironde department from 2007 to 2017 as a member of the Socialist Party. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:People from Gironde Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Politicians from Nouvelle-Aquitaine
title: Philippe Plisson
